page.title: 03THE HOUSING ESTATE
page.content: Our estate is on the edge of the marsh. Most of the houses here are semi-detached but two are detached.Each house has a back and front garden which are quite big. People put flowers in their gardens.The driveways are wide and our car stands on it. Inside, the houses have a living room, a kitchen, three bedrooms and a bathroom. Our estate has no shops, letterbox or post-office but there is a telephone box on the corner of the main road which leads down to the coast road. There are two islands of grass on the estate. One is an oval shape, the other is triangular. The triangular one has two trees on it about three meters apart and we
